---

In the latest update for Genshin Impact, version 6.5, miHoYo has made significant changes to the game's Russian localization. The adjustments aim to enhance the overall gaming experience for Russian-speaking players by improving the accuracy and cultural relevance of translations. The developers acknowledged previous criticisms regarding localization quality and emphasized their commitment to better representation. These changes not only reflect miHoYo's responsiveness to player feedback but also highlight the importance of localization in global gaming markets. The implications of this update suggest a growing trend among game developers to prioritize cultural sensitivity and linguistic precision, potentially leading to increased player satisfaction and engagement in diverse regions.
